description:
This is a fun, addictive, and accessible casual puzzle game. You could easily lose hours to it -- per sitting!

And unlike many other open source games, this one doesn't look like it was written in 1995. It uses GTK and has a clean look and interface. Recommended.
An addictive little amusement but there seems to be no difference in the three choices of play. Normal, Timed and Endless all behave the same way.
summary: No differences between the three game modes

description: It just will not launch and I don't know why.
Crashes whenever you try to disable sound effects

works fine for me. a little game to kill your precious time .
didn't crash when i disable sounds
summary: Still a better game than Candy Crush XD

description: After I restarted the game nothing works. So I have to restart my Computer.
summary: Crashes whenever I disable animated Sound

description: Overall the game plays nicely. Limited in challenge and scoring compared to Bejeweled. One drwback I'm experiencing. Does not quit correctly. Have to force quit it everytime.
Would not allow moving the jewels

It says it's a clone of the commercial proprietary version, but it's far less addictive. The commercial version has a lot of different bonuses and animations, giving superpower when you make a big combo, here, it's not the case, and the graphical side is not as good.
summary: Far from being as good as the commercial version, needs improvements

description: It works great! SImple fun and NO ADDS take that candy crush.
summary: It works great! SImple fun and NO ADDS take that candy crush

description: I have been using this little game for year. Its a nice distraction when I want to take a break. I have had it on several different versions of Ubuntu and Ubuntu Mate with no issues.

Game screen is blank:

OS: Fedora release 33 (Thirty Three) x86_6 
Host: ThinkPad Yoga 11e 
Kernel: 5.8.16-300.fc33.x86_64 
Resolution: 1366x768 
DE: GNOME 3.38.1 
WM: Mutter
Played Gweled for several years with no problems, but recent upgrade to Fedora 33 game displays only corrupted blocks.
summary: Great time waster no longer playable

description: The game just draws a mess of bitmaps that seem to come from wrong parts of memory. It "works" but you just can't see what you're doing.
Closely resembles Bejeweled! I like it.
Displays garbled images in the game play box. Unusable.
Worked great in Ubuntu 20.04 but opens in a mess in 20.10.
its a good game, actually met no issue from those said below
It shows a black screen in the tiles area.
This is on Fedora 33
summary: Can't play it, screen is black

description: Works well no issues but the music could be softer

see title.

it isnow feb 2022, & the program still crashes if you try to disable the sound (This was first reported in 2019)
summary: it is feb 2022, & still crashes if sound disabled (1st report 2019)

summary: please fix sound controls try to turn off soud and app freezes!

description: Causes system to freeze.

I love that game. It is jewels without any hassle or fancy stuff.
The only thing that is annoying is the small window size...
Would be really nice to be able to resize the window!

But thank you for the good work
Cool but pretty outdated in terms of UI.
cannot play as it freezes when i wanna move jewels

The click sound have an issue. Keep on playing the game will keep the click sound working. 10 seconds on wait the first click won't play the click sound.

I hope the click sound is fixed on the Beta 1.
summary: Waiting on the Gweled 1.0 Beta 1 to be release

description: El juego no e compatible con la ultima version del software y siempre se debe forzar el cierre porque no responde
el de abajo es fruto
le puase varias resoluciones de pantalla y no corre
pensaba que era frefire

A simple and nice game that works quite well, rhythmed by an entertaining music which reminds of the Amiga 500 era. For now, it lacks the features and special effects/movements that you could find in this type of game.
summary: Missing features/effects but still a simple/nice game

description: it would be easy to avoid solutions being indicated. It's very annoying when you want to work your eyes by yourself. We do not care about the solution, the pleasure is to look for !

L'application se lance mais les images du jeu ne s'affiche pas donc le jeu est inutilisable.
Dommage :/
passe bien le temps
la grille de jeu s'affiche en noir.... et la musique est crispante, impossible de l'arrêter.
